title: SOLID POLYMER ELECTROLYTE
abstract: The invention relates to a polymer composition comprising: a) a thermoplastic copolyester comprising i. polyester hard segments in an amount of between 5 and 50 wt.%, with respect to the total weight of the polymer composition, and ii. soft segments having a number average molecular weight of between 2.000 and 10.000 g/mol; and b) a metal salt; and c) an organic nitrile component, and wherein the metal salt is present in a weight percentage between 10 to 80 wt.%, the organic nitrile component is present in a weight percentage between 10 and 80 wt.%, and the soft segment is present in a weight percentage between 10 and 80 wt.%, wherein the weight percentages are with respect to the total weight of metal salt, organic nitrile component and soft segment; as well as a battery comprising the polymer composition.

motivations: There is a need for improved polymer compositions for use in batteries and other applications.
objectives: Develop a polymer composition that combines a thermoplastic copolyester with a metal salt and an organic nitrile component.
methods: Create a polymer composition with specific weight percentages of thermoplastic copolyester, metal salt, and organic nitrile component.
Use a thermoplastic copolyester with polyester hard segments and soft segments of a certain molecular weight range.
results: A solid polymer electrolyte with potentially improved properties for use in batteries and other applications.
llama_json.research_subject: Development of a solid polymer electrolyte composition

motivations: There is a need for improved polymer compositions for use in batteries.
objectives: Develop a polymer composition comprising a thermoplastic copolyester, a metal salt, and an organic nitrile component.
Incorporate the developed polymer composition into a battery.
methods: Formulate a polymer composition with specific weight percentages of polyester hard segments, soft segments, metal salt, and organic nitrile component.
Integrate the polymer composition into a battery.
results: A new polymer composition for use in batteries is created.
openai_json.research_subject: Development of a solid polymer electrolyte for batteries

motivations: There is a need for improved solid polymer electrolytes with enhanced ionic conductivity and mechanical properties for battery applications.
objectives: Develop a polymer composition that combines thermoplastic copolyester, metal salt, and organic nitrile components to create an effective solid polymer electrolyte.
methods: Formulate a polymer composition using thermoplastic copolyester with specific hard and soft segment ratios, metal salts, and organic nitrile components in controlled weight percentages.
results: The invention provides a solid polymer electrolyte composition suitable for battery applications with optimized ionic conductivity and mechanical properties.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Solid polymer electrolyte composition for battery applications
